title: Meanie Genie
desc:
*I have three wishes to grant myself, and I won't be careful with what I wish for!*

His regular attacks will alternate between additionally inflicting Shock 6, Poison 6, or Chill 6. His initial debuff will be random, but afterwards, he'll follow that same order of attacks.

Its direct damage is low, but staying in this fight for any length of time can result in lasting damages as a result of Shock and Poison. Don't let these effects stack by any means necessary.
